group.title: the basics
group.text: This set of items asks about your background, household, and contact information. The purpose is to gather some general information about you.

question.text: In what country were you born?
Which categories describe you? Select all that apply. Note, you may select more than one group.

option.display: American Indian or Alaska Native (For example: Aztec, Blackfeet Tribe, Mayan, Navajo Nation, Native Village of Barrow Inupiat Traditional Government, Nome Eskimo Community, etc.)*
Asian (For example: Asian Indian, Chinese, Filipino, Japanese, Korean, Vietnamese, etc.) *
Black, African American or African (For example: African American, Ethiopian, Haitian, Jamaican, Nigerian, Somali, etc.) *
Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish (For example: Columbian, Cuban, Dominican, Mexican or Mexican American, Puerto Rican, Salvadoran, etc.) *
Middle Eastern or North African (For example: Algerian, Egyptian, Iranian, Lebanese, Moroccan, Syrian, etc.) *
Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander (For example: Chamorro, Fijian, Marshallese, Native Hawaiian, Tongan, etc.)
White (For example: English, European, French, German, Irish, Italian, Polish, etc.) *
None of these fully describe me (optional free text answer)

option.code: None of these fully describe me
option.display: None of these fully describe me
None of these fully describe me
None of these fully describe me
None of these fully describe me
None of these fully describe me

question.text: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

option.display: None of these fully describe me
None of these fully describe me

question.text: What was your biological sex assigned at birth?
What terms best express how you describe your gender identity? (Check all that apply)

option.display: none of these describe me, and I want to specify

question.text: Are any of these a closer description to your gender identity? (Check all that apply)

option.display: questioning or unsure of your gender identity
none of these describe me, and I want to specify

question.text: Which of the following best represents how you think of yourself?

option.display: straight; that is, not gay or lesbian
none of these describe me, and I’d like to see additional options

question.text: Are any of these a closer description of how you think of yourself?

option.display: have not figured out or are in the process of figuring out your sexuality
mostly straight, but sometimes attracted to people of your own sex
do not think of yourself as having sexuality
do not use labels to identify yourself

question.text: What is the highest grade or year of school you completed?

extension.valueString: ¿Cuál es el grado o nivel de educación más alto que ha completado?

option.display: never attended school or only attended kindergarten

extension.valueString: nunca fue a la escuela o solo fue al kínder

option.display: college 1 to 3 years (some college or technical school)

extension.valueString: 4 años o más de universidad (graduado del universidad)

question.text:
One of the things we're trying to understand is how people's income may affect their use of health services. Household income includes your income plus the income of all family members in your household for the last calendar year. Include all wages and other sources of income. 

What is your annual household income from all sources?

extension.valueString: ¿Cuál es su ingreso annual del hogar incluyendo todas las fuentes?

question.text:
Have you ever served on active duty in the United States Armed forces, either in the regular military or in a National Guard or military reserve unit? 

Note: Active duty does not include training for the Reserves or National Guard, but DOES include activation, for example, for the Persian Gulf War.

extension.valueString:
¿Alguna vez ha estado en servicio activo en las Fuerzas Armadas de los Estados Unidos, ya sea en el servicio militar regular, en la Guardia Nacional o en una unidad de reserva militar? 
NOTA: El servicio activo no incluye el entrenamiento en la Reserva ni en la Guardia Nacional, pero SÍ incluye las actividades de movilización, por ejemplo, para la Guerra del Golfo Pérsico.	Sí

question.text: What is your current marital status?

extension.valueString: vive en pareha sin estar casado

question.text: Are you covered by health insurance or some other kind of health care plan?

What kind of health insurance or health care coverage do you have?  Include those that pay for only one  type  of  service  (nursing  home  care,  accidents,  or  dental care).    Exclude private plans that only provide extra cash while hospitalized.  If you have more than one kind of health insurance, mark all plans that you have.  

Here is more information about the Medicaid programs     https://www.medicaid.gov/medicaid/by-state/by-state.html

option.display: Single service plan (e.g., dental, vision,  prescriptions)

extension.valueString: Single service plan (e.g., dental, vision,  prescriptions)

question.text: What is your current employment status?  Please select 1 or more of these categories.

option.display: out of work for 1 year or more
out of work for less than 1 year

extension.valueString: ha estado desempleado/a por menos de 1 año
soy una mujer u hombre que me ocupo de tareas de la casa

question.text: Pick your answers from the following choices
Do you own or rent your home?

option.display: Hospital, rehabilitation center, drug treatment center, or other temporary institution
In a group home, nursing home, or other residential facility
Anywhere outside (e.g., street, vehicle, abandoned building)

question.text: How many years have you lived at your current address?

extension.valueString: ¿Cuántos años ha vivido en su dirección actual?

question.text: In the past 6 months, have you been worried or concerned about NOT having stable housing that you own, rent, or stay in as part of a household?
